sources.title: Genocide
sources.description: The insects are taking over in this nasty piece of disaster horror directed by Kazui Nihonmatsu. A group of military personnel transporting a hydrogen bomb are left to figure out how and why swarms of killer bugs took down their plane; the answer is more deliriously nihilistic—and convoluted—than you could imagine. Also known as  War of the Insects, Genocide  enacts a cracked doomsday scenario like no other.

metadata.Plot: All the insects on Earth become wild and attack humans, causing Armageddon.
metadata.Actors: Keisuke Sonoi, Yûsuke Kawazu, Emi Shindô
